name: Total Rush
description:
We've fused Card Gaming with the Battle of Total War to create the ultimate multiplayer strategy game. Combine a unique deck from different factions, rally your legions, and charge to defeat all your opponents!

Game Features:

  • Strategically Assembled Decks: Choose your cards with care! Utilize your gold every turn to acquire new cards, encountering diverse ranks and nations' decks as you level up. Smart combinations and synergies bolster your army's numbers and power, ensuring your victory over enemies.
  • Distinct Hero Abilities: Each game begins with the selection of a hero, whose unique early and late-stage abilities offer a balance of risk and reward. Pairing different cards with your hero's skills can significantly empower your forces.
  • Richness of Nations: Every national squad boasts distinct tactics. Master these unique strategies to leverage the full might of nations and discover various engaging modes of play.

Total Rush has already launched its early access, featuring:

  • Five nations that each have their own unique set of cards.
  • 100+ fully implemented cards
  • 70+ heroes to choose
  • Campaign Mode offers the flexibility to pause the game at any moment for strategic planning, with no time constraints, enabling asynchronous combat with players in the world.
  • Arena 1v1 Mode sets you up in quick, real-time matches against seven other players, where the goal is to be the final survivor in a fast-paced elimination showdown.
  • Arena 2v2 Mode: Pair up with a friend, fight side by side, and send help to each other’s battles to triumph as a team.
